reviews.review_msg: Brenda is an excellent prof! She is absolutely good at teaching calc and is very knowledgeable. she always encourages questions.Really recommend her for future math courses!!

Do Not take this class by distance ed, whatever you do... I have taken many classes by distance ed without a prob, but having done Math 190 by distance fills me with regret and my GPA has taken a rough blow.

If you really want to learn something, DO NOT take his course! it seems like he just memorizes the content and then repeats it in class. Grades on mid-terms are below 50%,and he just keeps asking the class why are the grades sooo low without finding out his own problem! If you have astrong math background, get an A is pretty easy.
